EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal P.O.V. Week of April 27, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Week of April 27, 2015 <http://www.cfsummit.com/> CLOUD FOUNDRY SUMMIT: DIVERSITY IN AN OPEN SOURCE COMMUNITY Pivotal is pleased to host a special luncheon and program at Cloud Foundry Summit, featuring Robin Hauser Reynolds, the amazing filmmaker behind the new documentary, "CODE: Debugging the Gender Gap <http://www.codedoc.co/>" and a moderated panel on “Diversity in an Open Source Community” featuring Malini Bhandaru (Intel), Sheryl Chamberlain (Capgemini), Cornelia Davis (Pivotal) and Eileen Evans (HP).
We encourage all women attending Cloud Foundry Summit to attend this special program. RSVP <http://www.cfsummit.com/program/cloud-foundry-community-diversity-lunch> quickly since seating is limited. REGISTER <http://www.cfsummit.com/program/cloud-foundry-community-diversity-lunch> WEDNESDAY, APRIL 29TH, "SO ISN'T MICROSERVICES JUST SOA WITH JSON" <http://pivotal.io/podcasts> Join us this week for our latest episode of our All Things Pivotal Podcast Series, "So Isn't Microservices Just SOA with JSON?".
Coté speaks to Apiary’s CEO Jakub Nešetři about how as you jump into microservices, it starts to sound a lot of SOA. SUBSCRIBE <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal> PIVOTAL EXTENDS HAWQ, THE SQL ON HADOOP ENGINE, TO HORTONWORKS HDP <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/pivotal-extends-hawq-the-sql-on-hadoop-engine-to-hortonworks-hdp> Building on February’s announcements around the Open Data Platform initiative, where Pivotal and Hortonworks along with other big data visionaries, partnered to create a common commercial core of Apache Hadoop® projects, Pivotal and Hortonworks announced today that Pivotal HAWQ, the SQL on Hadoop query engine that speeds up big data queries by up to 1000x, is now available on Hortonworks Data Platform.
READ MORE… <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/pivotal-extends-hawq-the-sql-on-hadoop-engine-to-hortonworks-hdp> PIVOTAL PEOPLE - SARAH AERNI ON HOW TO BECOME A DATA SCIENTIST <http://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/pivotal-people/pivotal-people-sarah-aerni-on-how-to-become-a-data-scientist> In this post, one of Pivotal’s Principal Data Scientists, Sarah Aerni, answers 7 questions about data science as a profession and covers the type of data scientists on the Pivotal team. She answers questions about career paths, popularity, skills, experience, typical projects, tips for students, and why Pivotal is a great place to be a data scientist.
